names.title: Names
names.select-components: Please select at least one name component
names.click-to-adopt: Click on a name to adopt it for the character
names.no-permission: You don't have permission to use the name generator.

permissionChange.title: Permission Changed
permissionChange.content: Your Names Generator permission has been changed by the Game Master. A page reload is required for the changes to take effect.

showInTokenControls.name: Show Button in Token Controls
showInTokenControls.hint: Shows the name generator button in the left toolbar

showInCharacterSheet.name: Show Button in Character Sheet
showInCharacterSheet.hint: Shows a name picker button next to the name field in character sheets

showInTokenContextMenu.name: Token HUD & Context Menu
showInTokenContextMenu.hint: Shows a name button in the token HUD and adds a 'Change Name' option to the right-click menu

roleConfig.name: Configure Role Permissions
roleConfig.hint: Determine which user roles can use the name generator
roleConfig.label: Configure Roles

includeNonbinaryNames.name: Include Non-binary Names
includeNonbinaryNames.hint: Allows selection of non-binary first names if the species supports it

roleConfig.title: Name Generator Role Permissions
roleConfig.description: Select which user roles are allowed to use the name generator. Users without the appropriate role will not see any name generator buttons and cannot use chat commands.

console.clipboard-fallback: Clipboard API not available, using fallback

names.settings.showEmergencyButton.name: Show "Emergency-NPC"-Button
names.settings.showEmergencyButton.hint: Shows a button below the chat for quick NPC name generation
names.emergency.title: Emergency NPC Names
names.emergency.description: Click a name to copy it to your clipboard
names.emergency.hint: Names are generated using the default settings of the name generator module
